snippet: Reflecting deep partisan divide, competing amendments attached to the cybersecurity bill would make it easier or harder for the government to look at the private online data of United States citizens.
abstract: Reflecting deep partisan divide, competing amendments attached to the cybersecurity bill would make it easier or harder for the government to look at the private online data of United States citizens.

headline.main: Again, Wrangling Over Surveillance in the Cybersecurity Bill
